synopsis.text: The anime is a product of the Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation, directed by Kaori Ryo in her first year of work, 2015. The soundscape is enriched by the music of Chika Watanabe and sound design by Sachi Takahashi, with Mitsuko Okamoto serving as the producer. The narrative revolves around the mundane scenes of everyday life that spark imaginations, leading to a fantastical amalgamation of thoughts and ideas. This anime invites viewers to explore the intriguing intersection of reality and fantasy, where the ordinary transforms into the extraordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
